title: Northside Music Festival 2025
description: The Northside Music Festival consists of a curated lineup with a wide variety of musical genres. In addition to music, the festival has numerous art vendors, food, and free, family-friendly activities.

title: BOOM on the Bridge 2025
description: Beaver County BOOM's fireworks display, launched at the convergence of the Ohio and Beaver Rivers, is one of the largest fireworks shows in Western PA

title: 11th Allentown Night Market
description: The Allentown Night Market is a most curious bi-annual artist and performance faire in Pittsburgh's Allentown neighborhood. The Night Market hosts over 100 unusual and offbeat artisans and crafters, live performances, food and beverage vendors all within 4 indoor/outdoor markets that sprawl the 800 block of Warrington Ave and Manton Way.â€‹

title: Beers of the Burgh 2025
description: The 11th Annual Beers of the Burgh Festival at the historic Carrie Blast Furnaces!  Eagleburger Band is PGH beer-positive

title: Pittonkatonk 2025
description: Pittonkatonk is Pittsburgh's best outdoor music festival, and it's totally free. We hope to see you there, it's a guaranteed awesome time.
location: Vietnam Veterans Pavilion in Schenley Park

title: Millvale Music Fest 2025
description: We'll be among 300+ musical acts in Millvale - it's a tremendous free community event.

title: Lawrenceville Memorial Day Parade
description: One of the oldest parades in the nation, featuring over 65 groups including marching bands, veterans' organizations, classic cars and local mascots, Eagleburger Band is living proof that this parade is fun for everyone.

title: Pittsburgh Montessori Fun Fair
description: Pittsburgh Montessori Fun Fair is a community-wide carnival featuring games, bounce houses, a 50/50 raffle, delicious food, selfie stations, a cardboard city, and a lot more.

title: Past Gig
description: This gig is in the past and should not appear.
